name: Snabbit
description:
With more than 500,000 downloads, we celebrate this by releasing the game for FREE! There is no reason why you shouldn't ask just one friend to download? Help us reach 1 million downloads :D (it's free of course).

Selected in Free App Magic - 3 Great paid apps for free every day

"Fun and addictive, even for ungamers like me"
- Cult of Mac

"The level editor gives the app a lot of replay value and the 1% contest makes an already fun game even more appealing!"
- 148apps (4/5 stars)

"From the catchy music to the gameplay, this is a game everyone should have on their tablet. We wish we had played Snabbit sooner."
- Famigo (5/5 stars, Staff favourite)

"The end result is an enormously fun experience that is challenging yet rewarding."
- Appchronicles

-------------------------------------

Is it a snake?! Is it a rabbit?! No, it's Snabbit!

Guide the star-craving Snabbit through murky asteroid belts while hunting cosmic treasure…
Snabbit is a simple and addictive Arcade game. Try it out!

-----------------------------------------

90 AMAZING LEVELS
Guide the Snabbit through three huge level packs of increasing
difficulty and cleverness! 

HIDDEN DIAMONDS
If you're looking for a real challenge, try becoming the first
player to find the hidden diamonds scattered throughout!

ENDLESS MODE WITH FRIENDS
Play the endless survival mode against your friends! Auto-generated
levels changing every 6 hours.

UNIVERSAL APP
Snabbit plays great on your iPod/iPhone/iPad!

GAME CENTER LEADERBOARDS
